    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_c9753c81200ee9547aba0162666cd37087ffcec2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Making bread</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bilden des Brotes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fabrication du pain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fazendo o pão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fare pane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατασκευή του ψωμιού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fabricación del pan</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of three illustrations detailing the steps in preparing bread. After kneading, the bread dough, it is left to rise through the action of the yeast.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kneading</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">microorganisms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">yeast</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von drei Abbildungen, welche 
die Jobsteps genau schildern, wenn Brot vorbereitet wird. 
Nachdem man der Brotteig geknetet hat, wird es Anstieg durch die
Tätigkeit der Hefe überlassen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de trois illustrations détaillant
les étapes en préparant le pain. Après le malaxage, la pâte 
de pain, il est laissé à l'élévation par l'action de la levure.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de três ilustrações que detalham as
etapas em preparar o pão. Após kneading, a massa de pão de 
pão, é deixado à ascensão com a ação do fermento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di tre illustrazioni che 
dettagliano i punti nella preparazione del pane. Dopo 
l'impastamento, la pasta di pane, è lasciato all'aumento con l'azione
del lievito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη τριών απεικονίσεων που απαριθμούν τα βήματα 
στην προετοιμασία του ψωμιού. Μετά από να ζυμώσει, η ζύμη 
ψωμιού, αφήνεται για να αυξηθεί μέσω της ενέργειας της ζύμης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de tres ilustraciones que 
detallan los pasos de progresión en la preparación del pan. 
Después de amasar, la pasta de pan, se deja a la subida con la 
acción de la levadura.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kneten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mikroorganismen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hefe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">malaxage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">micro-organismes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">levure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">microorganismi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
